name: WORX 40 V Hedge Trimmer
categoryPath: Patio & Garden/Gardening & Lawn Care/Other Outdoor Power Equipment

reviews.name: Worx 22" 40V Cordless Hedge Trimmer
reviews.reviewText: I love WORX. Their products are lightweight, durable and have power despite being battery powered. I also love their weed wackier.
reviews.title: 40V Max Lithium Hedge Trimmer

reviews.name: Worx 22" 40V Cordless Hedge Trimmer
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to do a tough job. it went threw that job with ease. lots of power. easy to use.
reviews.title: awesome

reviews.name: Worx 22" 40V Cordless Hedge Trimmer
reviews.reviewText: Def. a work horse....cuts the bushes with ease...I have big thick bushes.Battery keeps its' charge a long time
reviews.title: powerful

reviews.name: Worx 22" 40V Cordless Hedge Trimmer
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for the 24 volt modell for that is the one I had that just wore out from use. evidently they no longer make that model so decided to buy the 40 volt one. Havent had a chance to use it yet but have the blower and weedeater and love each product. you cant go wrong buying worx products.
reviews.title: thought I would try it
